name: SCP [REDACTED]
description:
This is my submission for Search for a Star. This game is a coop text-based narrative adventure that goes and explores various S.C.P.s in a quest to understand what has happened to your body, why are you trapped in a computer, and why are you forced to endure these dangerous experiments? Choose your path accordingly and be careful not to die too many times...

Controls:

Simply press the various numbers depending on which choice you want to pick.

Press any key to fast forward the text

Esc to exit the game

B to use your escape device during an encounter

R to use your radio during an encounter (if unlocked)

Alt +F4 for rage quitting when you die for the fourth time.
